snippet: Phil Kessel scored twice and Mikhail Grabovski had two assists as the surging Maple Leafs beat the Edmonton Oilers, 6-3, in Toronto.
abstract: Toronto Maple Leafs beat Edmonton Oilers, 6-3; other NHL scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Phil Kessel scored twice and Mikhail Grabovski had two assists as the surging Maple Leafs beat the Edmonton Oilers, 6-3, in Toronto.

headline.main: Surging Maple Leafs Outlast the Oilers
headline.print_headline: Surging Maple Leafs Outlast the Oilers
